creator: Syretia
text:
## [imgbb.com](https://imgbb.com/)
Useful for uploading pictures, no account required and easy to use on mobile. Requires your own API key for command line usage.
```bash
curl -LX POST "https://api.imgbb.com/1/upload?key=YOUR_CLIENT_API_KEY" -F "image=@/path/to/file.png"
```
## [filebin.net](https://filebin.net)
Upload to filebin.net through the command line:
```bash
curl --data-binary "@/path/to/file.png" -H "filename: file.png" https://filebin.net
```
title: images
caption: Image Hosts
